introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content: ProInvest by Livion Real Estate is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information when you use our services.

dataCollection.title: Information We Collect
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us and information that we obtain automatically when you use our services:
dataCollection.personalInfo: Personal information (name, email, phone number) from consultation forms and contact forms
dataCollection.propertyInfo: Property details and specifications from consultation questionnaires
dataCollection.usageData: Website usage data and analytics (anonymized) via Umami Analytics
dataCollection.consultationData: Consultation responses including property type, location, value, timeline, and investment goals

dataUsage.title: How We Use Your Information
dataUsage.content: We use the information we collect to:
dataUsage.provideServices: Provide and improve our property sales services
dataUsage.communicate: Communicate with you about your properties and our services
dataUsage.improveServices: Analyze and improve our website and services
dataUsage.consultation: Generate personalized property sales proposals and recommendations
dataUsage.analytics: Understand website usage patterns to improve user experience

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to third parties without your consent, except as described in this policy or as required by law. We may share anonymized analytics data with Umami Analytics for website performance monitoring.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement appropriate security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. All data is processed securely and in compliance with GDPR requirements.

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data for the following periods:
dataRetention.consultationData: Consultation data: 2 years after last contact
dataRetention.contactInfo: Contact information: Until you request deletion
dataRetention.legalData: Legal compliance data: As required by Serbian law

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us:

acceptance.title: Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using ProInvest services, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement.

services.title: Our Services
services.content: ProInvest provides comprehensive property sales services including:
services.consultation: Free consultation and personalized property sales proposals
services.websiteCreation: Custom website creation with SEO optimization

payment.title: Payment Terms
payment.content: Our payment structure is designed to minimize your risk:
payment.noUpfront: No upfront costs - you only pay when properties sell
payment.commission: Commission-based pricing: 2-5.5% based on property value
payment.paymentTerms: Payment only upon successful property sale
payment.geographicScope: Services available in Serbia, Montenegro, and Croatia

businessModel.title: Business Model
businessModel.content: ProInvest operates on a zero-risk investment approach:
businessModel.vipModel: Full-Service VIP Model - complete service package from website to closing
businessModel.scarcity: Limited capacity - only 2 VIP properties accepted monthly
businessModel.targetMarket: Primary focus on building investors and developers
businessModel.expansion: Expanding to Montenegro (Budva, Kotor, Podgorica) and Croatia (Zagreb, Dubrovnik, Split)

obligations.title: Obligations
obligations.content: Both parties have specific obligations under this agreement:

client.title: Client Obligations
client.accurateInfo: Provide accurate and complete property information
client.cooperation: Cooperate with our marketing and sales efforts
client.legalCompliance: Ensure legal compliance of property documentation
client.propertyAccess: Provide access to property for photography and virtual tours

proinvest.title: ProInvest Obligations
proinvest.professionalService: Provide professional marketing and sales services
proinvest.support: Offer ongoing support throughout the sales process
proinvest.website: Create and maintain custom property website
proinvest.media: Provide professional photography and virtual tours

liability.title: Liability
liability.content: ProInvest's liability is limited to the services provided. We are not liable for market conditions, property values, or external factors beyond our control. Our success depends on market conditions and buyer interest.

termination.title: Termination
termination.content: Either party may terminate this agreement with written notice. Termination does not affect obligations incurred prior to termination. No payment is required if no sale occurs.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.content: This agreement is governed by Serbian law and any disputes will be resolved in Serbian courts.

contact.title: Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these terms, please contact us:

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies
whatAreCookies.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience and understand how you use our site.

howWeUseCookies.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUseCookies.content: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, remember your preferences, and analyze site traffic. Cookies help us understand how you use our site and improve our services.

essential.title: Essential Cookies
essential.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly and cannot be disabled.

functional.title: Functional Cookies
functional.description: These cookies enable enhanced functionality and personalization.
functional.locale: Language preference (NEXT_LOCALE) - remembers your language choice
functional.theme: Theme preference - remembers your dark/light mode choice

analytics.title: Analytics Cookies
analytics.description: These cookies help us understand how visitors interact with our website.

thirdPartyCookies.title: Third-Party Cookies
thirdPartyCookies.content: We use the following third-party services that may set cookies:
thirdPartyCookies.nextThemes: Next.js Themes - for dark/light mode functionality

cookieManagement.title: Managing Cookies
cookieManagement.content: You can control and manage cookies in several ways:

browserSettings.title: Browser Settings
browserSettings.content: Most browsers allow you to control cookies through their settings:
browserSettings.chrome: Chrome: Settings > Privacy and Security > Cookies
browserSettings.edge: Edge: Settings > Cookies and Site Permissions

functionalCookies.title: Functional Cookie Management
functionalCookies.content: You can manage functional cookies through our website:
functionalCookies.language: Language preference can be changed using the language switcher
functionalCookies.theme: Theme preference can be changed using the theme toggle button

updates.title: Policy Updates
updates.content: We may update this Cookie Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: If you have questions about our use of cookies, please contact us:

introduction.title: GDPR Compliance
introduction.content: ProInvest by Livion Real Estate is committed to complying with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and protecting your personal data rights.

dataController.title: Data Controller
dataController.content: ProInvest by Livion Real Estate is the data controller for your personal information:

legalBasis.title: Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content: We process your personal data based on the following legal grounds:
legalBasis.consentDesc: When you voluntarily provide information through our consultation forms
legalBasis.contractDesc: To fulfill our contractual obligations for property sales services
legalBasis.legitimateDesc: To improve our services and communicate with you about property sales
legalBasis.legalDesc: To comply with Serbian real estate and data protection laws

dataRights.title: Your Data Protection Rights
dataRights.content: Under GDPR, you have the following rights regarding your personal data:

access.title: Right of Access
access.description: You can request copies of your personal data

rectification.title: Right to Rectification
rectification.description: You can request correction of inaccurate data

erasure.title: Right to Erasure
erasure.description: You can request deletion of your personal data

portability.title: Right to Data Portability
portability.description: You can request transfer of your data to another service

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: We retain your personal data for the following periods:
dataRetention.consultationData: Consultation data: 2 years after last contact
dataRetention.contactInfo: Contact information: Until you request deletion
dataRetention.analyticsData: Analytics data: 26 months maximum (anonymized via Umami)
dataRetention.legalData: Legal compliance data: As required by Serbian law

dataSecurity.title: Data Security Measures
dataSecurity.content: We implement comprehensive security measures to protect your data:
dataSecurity.encryption: Data encryption in transit and at rest
dataSecurity.training: Regular staff training on data protection
dataSecurity.anonymization: Analytics data is anonymized through Umami Analytics

dataBreach.title: Data Breach Notification
dataBreach.content: In the event of a data breach that may affect your personal data, we will notify you and the relevant authorities within 72 hours as required by GDPR.

complaints.title: Right to Complain
complaints.content: You have the right to lodge a complaint with the Serbian Data Protection Authority if you believe your data protection rights have been violated:

contact.title: Contact Our Data Protection Officer
contact.content: For any data protection inquiries or to exercise your rights, please contact our Data Protection Officer:

slide1.headline: We don't sell marketing. We build digital sales infrastructure for real estate developers.
slide1.subheadline: ProInvest + Livion ‚Äî IT development, marketing, and sales ‚Äî all under one system.

slide2.title: Who We Are
slide2.description: We're a full-stack IT and marketing company headquartered in Ruma, with operations focused on Belgrade and Novi Sad ‚Äî developing world-class digital systems for real estate.

team.sales: Real estate agents (on-site sales & investor management)

slide2.conclusion: This is why we don't act like an agency ‚Äî we function like your internal growth department.

slide3.title: What We Believe
slide3.mission: We believe that smaller investors deserve the same level of digital presence as Belgrade Waterfront or Delta District ‚Äî but with more authenticity and local soul.
slide3.vision: Our mission is to help smaller investors build premium brands that compete with the biggest projects ‚Äî showing that every building can have a premium digital presence, without losing authenticity.

slide4.title: What Developers Struggle With
slide4.headline: Your buildings are premium. Your digital presence shouldn't look second-hand.

problems.agents: Most developers rely on agents or Facebook posts.
problems.websites: Websites are outdated, not optimized for conversion.
problems.analytics: They have no analytics or CRM visibility.
problems.brand: Their brand looks small compared to their construction quality.
problems.time: They lose time following up leads manually.
problems.media: Lack of professional media content (photos, videos, virtual tours).

benefits.automated: Automated lead tracking and CRM system
benefits.premium: Premium website design that matches your construction quality
benefits.marketing: Professional marketing campaigns across all channels
benefits.brand: Build a premium brand that attracts high-value buyers

slide5.title: The ProInvest System
slide5.description: We don't just market ‚Äî we operate the full sales engine for your projects.

features.website: Dedicated website for each building and page for each apartment

slide6.title: Our Technology & Results
slide6.description: Every view, click, and inquiry is tracked. You see what we see ‚Äî full transparency.

slide7.title: How We Work
slide7.headline: We don't charge upfront. We earn when you earn.

standard.name: Standard Service
standard.description: Complete service package with zero upfront costs

premium.name: Premium Service
premium.description: Premium service with exclusive benefits & priority access
benefits: Priority access to our buyer network
Exclusive access to premium buyer database

enterprise.name: Custom Enterprise
enterprise.description: Fully customized service package tailored to your specific needs
coreFeatures: Flexible commission structure based on project size
Dedicated team tailored to your project
benefits: Custom-built service package per your requirements
Priority support with dedicated account manager
Full IT support team for technical needs
enterprise.note: Rate determined based on project size, complexity, and duration
enterprise.cta: Contact us for a personalized quote

deliverables.platform: Dedicated digital platform & app per project

slide9.title: Why Us
slide9.headline: Agencies do marketing. We build sales systems.

points.tech: We're a tech company, not a marketing agency.
points.local: We're not just a real estate agency ‚Äî that's just one of our services. We're an IT company that builds complete systems.
points.enterprise: We have in-house developers, agents, marketers, and lawyers ‚Äî complete expertise under one roof.
points.combined: We combine IT, marketing, and real estate under one roof.
points.results: We measure success by sales velocity, not "likes."

slide11.title: Visual Quality
slide11.tagline: Your building deserves a presentation that sells before it's finished.

slide12.title: Let's Build Your Next Success Together
slide12.description: We'll prepare your 60-day sales plan and digital concept within a week.
slide12.subdescription: If you like what you see, we move forward ‚Äî no pressure, just results.
